analyzed: shing sna tshogs yod de /

translated: The beams and rafters were made of gold and silver, so the three stories were also like that.

original: glo skar phyi nang yang rin po che sna bdun las byas shing mu tig gi dra bas brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: glo skar phyi nang yang rin po che sna bdun las byas shing mu tig gi dra bas brgyan pa ste /
translated: The outer and inner walls were also made of the seven precious substances and were adorned with pearl nets.

original: phyogs gzhan yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: phyogs gzhan yang de bzhin no //
translated: The other sides were also like that.

original: phyogs re re la yang dpag tshad re re yod cing /
analyzed: phyogs re re la yang dpag tshad re re yod cing /
translated: Each side was one yojana.

original: phyi nang gnyis ka yang rin po sna bdun las byas pa'i ri mos mdzes shing blta na sdug pa'o //
analyzed: phyi nang gnyis ka yang rin po sna bdun las byas pa'i ri mos mdzes shing blta na sdug pa'o //
translated: Both the outer and inner walls were made of the seven precious substances, with beautiful and pleasing designs.

original: kun dga' ra ba de la yang phyogs bzhin sgo re re yod de /
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba de la yang phyogs bzhin sgo re re yod de /
translated: The park also has four gates, one in each direction.

original: da yang rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'o //
analyzed: da yang rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'o //
translated: They are made of the four precious substances.

original: sgo re re la yang seng ge gnyis gnyis yod de /
analyzed: sgo re re la yang seng ge gnyis gnyis yod de /
translated: At each gate there are two lions.

original: seng ge de rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'o //
analyzed: seng ge de rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'o //
translated: The lions are made of the seven precious substances.

original: de bzhin du ka ba gnyis gnyis kyis mdzes shing /
analyzed: de bzhin du ka ba gnyis gnyis kyis mdzes shing /
translated: In the same way, the park is beautified by two pillars each.

original: chu srin tva ra na dang / bya khyung ga ru da dang / ri dags sha ra na dang / shang shang sa ra na la sogs pas mdzes shing rta babs bzhis phyogs bzhi nas mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: chu srin tva ra na dang / bya khyung ga ru da dang / ri dags sha ra na dang / shang shang sa ra na la sogs pas mdzes shing rta babs bzhis phyogs bzhi nas mdzes pa'o //
translated: It is also beautified by crocodiles, garuḍas, deer, and peacocks. It is beautified by four porticos in the four directions.

original: rta babs de yang rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'o //
analyzed: rta babs de yang rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'o //
translated: The porticos are made of the seven precious substances.

original: kun dga' ra ba de'i thog na /
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba de'i thog na /
translated: On the roof of the park

original: rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs sna tshogs kyis phyogs bzhi nas brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs sna tshogs kyis phyogs bzhi nas brgyan pa'o //
translated: there are various banners, flags, and parasols that adorn the four directions.

original: mu tig dang / rin po che dang / dril bu g-yer kha dang / dril bu yang gser dang ; dngul las grub pa ste /
analyzed: mu tig dang / rin po che dang / dril bu g-yer kha dang / dril bu yang gser dang ; dngul las grub pa ste /
translated: The pearls, precious substances, and small bells are made of gold and silver.

original: de rlung gis btab bas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra'i rol mo mkhan mkhas pas rol mo'i sgra skad sna tshogs 'byin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de rlung gis btab bas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra'i rol mo mkhan mkhas pas rol mo'i sgra skad sna tshogs 'byin pa bzhin no //
translated: When the wind blows on it, it produces various sounds like a skilled musician playing a musical instrument with eight qualities.

original: kun dga' ra ba'i ra ba rin po che bee d'urya las byas pa ste /
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba'i ra ba rin po che bee d'urya las byas pa ste /
translated: The outer wall of the pleasure grove is made of beryl jewels.

original: mtshams bzhi byi ru las byas pa'o //
analyzed: mtshams bzhi byi ru las byas pa'o //
translated: The four corners are made of coral.

original: de'i phyi nang yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i phyi nang yang de bzhin no //
translated: The outer and inner [parts] are also like that.

original: kun dga' ra ba de'i phyi logs na skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de /
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba de'i phyi logs na skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de /
translated: Outside that pleasure grove there are four pleasure groves,

original: de bzhin du rdzing bu dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdzing bu dang bcas pa'o //
translated: and also ponds.

original: skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu la yang me tog chu skyes thang skyes sna tshogs yod de /
analyzed: skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu la yang me tog chu skyes thang skyes sna tshogs yod de /
translated: In the pleasure groves and ponds there are various kinds of flowers, both aquatic and terrestrial.

original: dri zhi ma zhing blta na sdug pa /
analyzed: dri zhi ma zhing blta na sdug pa /
translated: They are fragrant, beautiful to behold,

original: dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / sngon po la sogs pas mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / sngon po la sogs pas mdzes pa'o //
translated: and adorned with white, yellow, red, green, blue, and so forth.

original: de bzhin du bya rnams kyang skad sna tshogs 'byin pas mdzes shing /
analyzed: de bzhin du bya rnams kyang skad sna tshogs 'byin pas mdzes shing /
translated: Similarly, the birds are also beautiful, producing various sounds.

original: shing ljon pa sna tshogs pa yang de bzhin no /
analyzed: shing ljon pa sna tshogs pa yang de bzhin no /
translated: The various trees are also like that.

original: tshong dpon mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba'i nges tig ni /
analyzed: tshong dpon mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba'i nges tig ni /
translated: The definition of the merchant Anāthapiṇḍada is as follows.

original: rus las btags pa'o //
analyzed: rus las btags pa'o //
translated: He is so called because of his family name.

original: yang na @95b dge ba'i rtsa ba thogs pa med par sbyin pas na zas sbyin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yang na @95b dge ba'i rtsa ba thogs pa med par sbyin pas na zas sbyin zhes bya'o //
translated: Or, he is called Anāthapiṇḍada because he gave food without obstruction to the roots of virtue.

original: rgyal bu'i tshal las grub pas rgyal byed tshal zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rgyal bu'i tshal las grub pas rgyal byed tshal zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it was built by Prince Jeta, it is called the Jeta Grove.

original: tshong dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la phul bas mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tshong dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das la phul bas mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya'o //
translated: Since it was offered to the Bhagavān by the merchant, it is called Anāthapiṇḍada’s Grove.

original: de bas na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “In the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍada’s Park, in Śrāvastī.”

original: bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang mi la sogs pa dang / thabs cig tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bye ba brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa /
analyzed: bzhugs te zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang mi la sogs pa dang / thabs cig tu byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bye ba brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa /
translated: Together with them were 8,400,000,000 bodhisattvas, all of whom were impeded by only one birth,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mthu chen po thob pa /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mthu chen po thob pa /
translated: irreversible from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, who had attained the great powers of all the tathāgatas,

original: rdo rje chen po rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po kun du ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po kun du ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa /
translated: the great vajra liberation, the emanation of the buddha realms through samādhi, the display of great miracles, and the teaching of the Dharma that accords with the minds and conduct of all sentient beings in a single instant, a single moment, a single occasion.

original: sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid mnyam zhing rgya che la zab pa dang / spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid mnyam zhing rgya che la zab pa dang / spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa /
translated: It is the equality of the various, vast and profound, and endowed with eloquence and miracles.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa rgya chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang dang mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa rgya chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang dang mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang /
translated: It is the offering of vast clouds of offerings to the tathāgatas in many buddha realms, the gateway of liberation, dhāraṇī, samādhi, power, higher knowledge, and the unshared qualities.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang ; sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang ; sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang /
translated: the branches of awakening, the path, the levels, the perfections, skillful means, the ways of attracting disciples, love, compassion, joy, and equanimity, the power of love,

original: bden pa dang / yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bden pa dang / yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag 'di lta ste /
translated: and the stream of a completely purified mind.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / kun du bzang po dang / nyi ma grags pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / kun du bzang po dang / nyi ma grags pa dang /
translated: They were the bodhisattva mahāsattva Kṣitigarbha, Ākāśagarbha, Vajrapāṇi, Lokeśvara, Sarva­nīvaraṇa­viṣkambhin, Samantabhadra, Yaśomitra,🔽Mahākaruṇika, Vajrayāśas,

original: snying rje chen po dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / @96a * //
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / @96a * //
translated: and

original: 'jam dpal grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
analyzed: 'jam dpal grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
translated: and the bodhisattva mahāsattva Maitreya, and so forth, and twenty-four hundred thousand quintillion bodhisattvas.

original: nyan thos chen po nyis brgya lnga bcu thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa /
analyzed: nyan thos chen po nyis brgya lnga bcu thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa /
translated: There were also two hundred and fifty great hearers, all of whom were arhats,

original: zag pa zad pa /
analyzed: zag pa zad pa /
translated: who had exhausted the defilements,

original: srid par kun du sbyor ba chad pa /
analyzed: srid par kun du sbyor ba chad pa /
translated: who had severed the bonds of existence,

original: yang dag pa'i ye shes sems shin tu rnam par grol ba rdzu 'phrul stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pas /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i ye shes sems shin tu rnam par grol ba rdzu 'phrul stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pas /
translated: who had attained the inconceivable magical power of the great supernormal knowledge of the mind’s complete liberation,

original: lta ba chags pa med pa thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba /
analyzed: lta ba chags pa med pa thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba /
translated: who were free from all attachments,🔽and who had burned up the seeds of the latent afflictions.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis bon bsregs pa sha stag 'di lta ste /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis bon bsregs pa sha stag 'di lta ste /
translated: They were:

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po dang /
translated: the Venerable Śāriputra, the Venerable Pūrṇa Maitrāyaniputra, the Venerable Kapphiṇa, the Venerable Subhūti, the Venerable Mahāmaudgalyāyana,

original: tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / che dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos rab tu mang po dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / che dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos rab tu mang po dang /
translated: the Venerable Cunda, the Venerable Nandī, the Venerable Kāśyapa, the Venerable Mahākāśyapa, the Venerable Urubilvā Kāśyapa, and many other śrāvakas,

original: dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zal sogs pa mang po 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang dri zal sogs pa mang po 'dus pa'o //
translated: bhikṣus, bhikṣuṇīs, upāsakas, upāsikās, devas, humans, asuras, gandharvas, and so forth had gathered.

original: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i dbus su /
analyzed: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i dbus su /
translated: In the middle of the Jeta Grove, in Anāthapiṇḍada's park,

original: rin po che rdo rje padma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te /
analyzed: rin po che rdo rje padma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te /
translated: He was seated on a lion throne in the heart of a jeweled lotus.

original: seng ge'i khri gang zhe na /🔽sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis /
analyzed: seng ge'i khri gang zhe na / sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis /
translated: What is a lion throne?

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang du gshegs pa'i sar 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang du gshegs pa'i sar 'byung ba'o //
translated: It is a throne that appears in the place where the blessed buddhas go by the power of their previous aspirations.

original: rin po che dang / rdo rje padma'i khris kun dga' rab mdzes pa dang / rin po che dang / mu tig dang / dril bu g-yer kha'i dra ba du ma sil sgra 'byung /
analyzed: rin po che dang / rdo rje padma'i khris kun dga' rab mdzes pa dang / rin po che dang / mu tig dang / dril bu g-yer kha'i dra ba du ma sil sgra 'byung /
translated: It is adorned with jeweled and vajra lotuses, and it is beautified with many jeweled nets of pearls and small bells that tinkle.

original: rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i stegs bu la rtsa ba legs par brten pa /
analyzed: rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i stegs bu la rtsa ba legs par brten pa /
translated: It is well supported by a foundation of many vajras and jewels.

original: rdo rje rin po che dum chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang / 'dam pa'i gnam rten bcug pa /
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che dum chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang / 'dam pa'i gnam rten bcug pa /
translated: It has a red pearl garland that comes from the mouth of a makara made of vajra and jewels, and it is held up by a pillar of coral.

original: rin po che du ma'i snying po can /
analyzed: rin po che du ma'i snying po can /
translated: It has a heart of many jewels.

original: chags pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / aindra n'i la dang / aindra n'i la chen po dang / mdun nas 'od zer chen po bar @96b snang la khyab pas kun nas mdzes pa dang / rin po che rdo rje thur mas brgyan pa'i gdugs yu bas bstod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i grib mas bsgribs shing bskyabs pa /
analyzed: chags pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / aindra n'i la dang / aindra n'i la chen po dang / mdun nas 'od zer chen po bar @96b snang la khyab pas kun nas mdzes pa dang / rin po che rdo rje thur mas brgyan pa'i gdugs yu bas bstod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i grib mas bsgribs shing bskyabs pa /
translated: It was adorned with precious jewels such as keke ru, great keke ru, indranila, great indranila, and great light rays that pervaded the sky in front, making it beautiful.

original: dpag bsam gyi shing du mas brgyan pas mdzes pa /
analyzed: dpag bsam gyi shing du mas brgyan pas mdzes pa /
translated: It was adorned with many wish-fulfilling trees.

original: rdo rje rin po che'i padma'i khri la kun dga' ra ba'i dbus na bzhugs te /
analyzed: rdo rje rin po che'i padma'i khri la kun dga' ra ba'i dbus na bzhugs te /
translated: He was seated in the center of the pleasure grove on a vajra-jewel lotus throne.

original: nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs ni rnam par brgyan /
analyzed: nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs ni rnam par brgyan /
translated: His light rays were brighter than a thousand suns, and the mandala was adorned.

original: zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni sdug par snang /
analyzed: zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni sdug par snang /
translated: He was as beautiful to the entire world as a full moon.

original: dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu rgyas shing chos ston te /
analyzed: dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shin tu rgyas shing chos ston te /
translated: Like a great wish-fulfilling tree, he was filled with the qualities of the Buddha and taught the Dharma.

original: tshangs par spyod pa /🔽thog mar dge ba /🔽bar du dge ba /
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa / thog mar dge ba / bar du dge ba /
translated: He teaches the pure life🔽that is virtuous in the beginning,

original: tha mar dge ba /🔽don bzang po //
analyzed: tha mar dge ba / don bzang po //
translated: virtuous in the middle,🔽and virtuous in the end.

original: tshig 'bru bzang po //
analyzed: tshig 'bru bzang po //
translated: It has good meaning and good words.

original: ma 'dres pa /🔽yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: ma 'dres pa / yongs su dag pa /
translated: It is unadulterated,🔽pure,🔽complete,

original: yongs su rdzogs pa /🔽yongs su byang ba /
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa / yongs su byang ba /
translated: and refined.

original: yang dag par rab tu ston to /
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu ston to /
translated: He teaches it perfectly.

original: spyi gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis blta bar mi mthong /
analyzed: spyi gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis blta bar mi mthong /
translated: His crown protrudes and is not seen by any sentient being.

original: bdud kyi las thams cad las ni des par rgyal /
analyzed: bdud kyi las thams cad las ni des par rgyal /
translated: He is victorious over all the works of Māra.

original: de kho na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thugs su chud /
analyzed: de kho na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thugs su chud /
translated: He has realized omniscience.

original: ye shes kyi spyan lnga ni mnga'/🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog dang ni ldan /
analyzed: ye shes kyi spyan lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog dang ni ldan /
translated: He has the five eyes of wisdom.🔽He has the supreme knowledge of all aspects.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan /
translated: He has the wisdom of omniscience.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan /
translated: He has all the qualities of a buddha.

original: bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom /
analyzed: bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom /
translated: He has defeated all the hosts of Māra and opponents.

original: grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa ni 'phags /
analyzed: grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa ni 'phags /

original: gang dag bar snang rgyu ba dang // gang dag lhun por gnas pa dang // zhes bya ba ni klu'i rigs la yang nam mkha' la rgyu zhing /
analyzed: gang dag bar snang rgyu ba dang // gang dag lhun por gnas pa dang // zhes bya ba ni klu'i rigs la yang nam mkha' la rgyu zhing /
translated: The nāga clans move in the sky,

original: ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas shing /
analyzed: ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas shing /
translated: dwell on the peak of Meru,

original: lha dang lha ma yin 'khrug par nus shing /
analyzed: lha dang lha ma yin 'khrug par nus shing /
translated: and are able to fight with the gods and asuras.

original: grags pa dang / kha dog dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: grags pa dang / kha dog dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing /
translated: They possess fame, complexion, and the bases of supernatural powers.

original: gang yang gang dag dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang gang dag dang ldan pa'o //
translated: They are endowed with those.

original: mgo gcig pa dang mgo gnyis pa //
analyzed: mgo gcig pa dang mgo gnyis pa //
translated: The one-headed and the two-headed,

original: de dag la ni nga rtag byams //
analyzed: de dag la ni nga rtag byams //
translated: I always have love for them.

original: zhes bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po rnams ni mi'i gzugs su gnas shing /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni klu'i rgyal po rnams ni mi'i gzugs su gnas shing /
translated: The nāga kings dwell in human form,

original: sbrul gyi gdengs ka bcas shing /
analyzed: sbrul gyi gdengs ka bcas shing /
translated: with the hood of a snake,

original: rigs bzhi la brgyad du gnas pa ste /
analyzed: rigs bzhi la brgyad du gnas pa ste /
translated: and dwell in the four castes as eight.

original: bram ze la ni sbrul mgo bco lnga pa ste /
analyzed: bram ze la ni sbrul mgo bco lnga pa ste /
translated: For the brahmins, there are fifteen snake heads.

original: rgyal rigs la bcu gsum pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal rigs la bcu gsum pa'o //
translated: The kṣatriyas have thirteen.

original: rje'u rigs la @106b bcu gcig pa ste /
analyzed: rje'u rigs la @106b bcu gcig pa ste /
translated: The vaiśyas have eleven.

original: dmangs rigs la bdun pa'o //
analyzed: dmangs rigs la bdun pa'o //
translated: The śūdras have seven.

original: de bzhin du bram ze'i bram ze'i rigs dang / rgyal po'i rgyal po'i rigs dang / rje'u'i rje'u'i rigs dang / dmangs kyi dmangs rigs la ni gdol pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bram ze'i bram ze'i rigs dang / rgyal po'i rgyal po'i rigs dang / rje'u'i rje'u'i rigs dang / dmangs kyi dmangs rigs la ni gdol pa'o //
translated: Similarly, the brahmins have the brahmin caste, the kṣatriyas have the kṣatriya caste, the vaiśyas have the vaiśya caste, and the śūdras have the śūdra caste.

original: rigs de la ni de yang nges pa med pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
analyzed: rigs de la ni de yang nges pa med pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
translated: Since there is no certainty in that caste, it is inconceivable.

original: de bzhin du de rnams kyi sbrul mgo yang bcu gsum pa dang bcu gcig dang bdun dang gsum dang la la yang gnyis dang gcig la nges pa med pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de rnams kyi sbrul mgo yang bcu gsum pa dang bcu gcig dang bdun dang gsum dang la la yang gnyis dang gcig la nges pa med pa'o //
translated: Similarly, their hoods also have thirteen, eleven, seven, three, two, or one head, with no certainty.

original: de rnams kyi kha dog la yang dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi kha dog la yang dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'o //
translated: Their colors are also white, yellow, red, and green.

original: de bzhin du yang dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / gzhan dmangs rigs kyi kha dog la nges pa med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dkar po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / gzhan dmangs rigs kyi kha dog la nges pa med do //
translated: Similarly, they are also white, yellow, red, green, and other colors, with no certainty in the śūdra caste.

original: rgyal po ji bzhin du 'khor rnams kyang yin te /
analyzed: rgyal po ji bzhin du 'khor rnams kyang yin te /
translated: Just as the king, so are the retinue.

original: de yang sa bdag sa srin sa bla mo la sogs pa'i sems can sna tshogs kyi gzugs su snang zhing /
analyzed: de yang sa bdag sa srin sa bla mo la sogs pa'i sems can sna tshogs kyi gzugs su snang zhing /
translated: Moreover, they appear in the forms of various beings, such as lords of the earth, nāgas, and earth goddesses.

original: klu'i gdon stong phrag bzhi stong brgyad cu'o ;
analyzed: klu'i gdon stong phrag bzhi stong brgyad cu'o ;
translated: There are 4,800,000 nāga spirits.

original: ; de bzhin du de dag gis kyang byams pa'o //
analyzed: ; de bzhin du de dag gis kyang byams pa'o //
translated: Likewise, they too are pervaded by love.

original: rkang pa med la nga byams te //
analyzed: rkang pa med la nga byams te //
translated: I love those without legs.

original: rkang gnyis pa la nga byams so //
analyzed: rkang gnyis pa la nga byams so //
translated: I love those with two legs.

original: zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa'i sku sh'akya seng ges khyab cing byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis khyab pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sprul pa'i sku sh'akya seng ges khyab cing byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis khyab pa'o //
translated: This means that the emanation body of Śākyasiṃha pervades the trichiliocosm and is pervaded by love, compassion, joy, and equanimity.

original: de bzhin du sems can rnams rkang med pa dang rkang gnyis pa la sogs te nga byams pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sems can rnams rkang med pa dang rkang gnyis pa la sogs te nga byams pa'o //
translated: Likewise, I love beings without legs, with two legs, and so on.

original: rkang bzhi pa la nga byams te //
analyzed: rkang bzhi pa la nga byams te //
translated: I love those with four legs.

original: rkang mngas la yang nga byams so //
analyzed: rkang mngas la yang nga byams so //
translated: I also love those with many legs.

original: zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa rnams kyi byams pa dang snying rje ni dmigs pa med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa rnams kyi byams pa dang snying rje ni dmigs pa med pa'o //
translated: The love and compassion of the Perfectly Awakened One Śākyamuni are without reference.

original: gzhan rnams la ni dmigs pa dang bcas shing rtog pa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan rnams la ni dmigs pa dang bcas shing rtog pa la gnas pa'o //
translated: Others have love and compassion with reference, and they are based on conceptualization.

original: de bzhin rkang bzhi rkang mngas la yang byams pas khyab pa'o //🔽rkang med da la gnod ma byed //
analyzed: de bzhin rkang bzhi rkang mngas la yang byams pas khyab pa'o // rkang med da la gnod ma byed //
translated: In the same way, he is pervaded by love for the four-legged and the many-legged.🔽Do not harm the legless!

original: rkang gnyis nga la gnod ma byed //
analyzed: rkang gnyis nga la gnod ma byed //
translated: Do not harm me, the two-legged!

original: ces bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i bden pa'i tshig dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi brjid dang / stobs dang mthus sems can rnams la gnod par mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i bden pa'i tshig dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi brjid dang / stobs dang mthus sems can rnams la gnod par mi nus pa'o //
translated: This is because, by the power of the true words of the Perfectly Awakened One Śākyamuni and the splendor, strength, and power of the Queen of Spells Mahāmāyūrī, sentient beings are unable to harm.

original: rkang bzhi nga la gnod ma byed //
analyzed: rkang bzhi nga la gnod ma byed //
translated: Do not harm me, the four-legged!

original: rkang mngas nga la gnod ma byed //
analyzed: rkang mngas nga la gnod ma byed //
translated: Do not harm me, the many-legged!

original: ces bya ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du @107a * //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du @107a * //
translated: This is as explained above.

original: byams pa la sogs pas khyab cing rkang bzhi dang rkang mngas la sogs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis gzhan yang 'byung po rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bden pa'i tshig dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis gnod par mi nus pa'o //🔽gang dag chu la gnas pa yi //🔽klu rnams kun la nga byams so //
analyzed: byams pa la sogs pas khyab cing rkang bzhi dang rkang mngas la sogs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis gzhan yang 'byung po rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bden pa'i tshig dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis gnod par mi nus pa'o // gang dag chu la gnas pa yi // klu rnams kun la nga byams so //
translated: and the four-legged and multi-legged bhūtas, and also the bhūtas, by the power of the Buddha’s words of truth and the splendor of the queen of knowledge mantras, are unable to harm.🔽🔽Those who dwell in the water,🔽I have love for all the nāgas.🔽🔽

original: zhes bya ba ni chu la gnas pa'i klu'i rigs rnams la sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis khyab cing klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed pa'o //🔽klu'i sdug bsngal gang zhe na /🔽sa g-yo ba dang / me'i phye ma'i char 'bab pa dang ; gang gi mi gtsang pa'i rul pa'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po dang bya khyung gi 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o //
